entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
